explanation: GET和PUT僅允許Admin使用，其餘method則是沒被限制。

options.A: A user whose role is Admin can perform a PUT.
options.C: A user whose role is Admin can perform a POST.
options.B: A user whose role is Admin can perform a GET.
options.E: A user whose role is Member can perform a POST.
options.D: A user whose role is Member can perform a PUT.
options.F: A user whose role is Member can perform a GET.
